article: nearly half of the nation 's air traffic controllers will reach the mandatory retirement age in the next decade , according to government estimates , forcing the federal aviation administration to triple its current rate of hiring and training at a time when air traffic is expected to grow significantly .
abstract: retirement wave creates shortage of air traffic controllers
